thread.title: Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston struggles to hold back tears paying tribute to Bill Paxton
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston struggles to hold back tears paying tribute to Bill Paxton

title: Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston struggles to hold back tears paying tribute to Bill Paxton
text: Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston struggles to hold back tears paying tribute to Bill Paxton Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston struggles to hold back tears paying tribute to Bill Paxton JENNIFER ANISTON got choked up introducing an emotional tribute to Titanic star Bill Paxton during last night's 89th Academy Awards ceremony. PUBLISHED: 07:09, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 | UPDATED: 08:05, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 ABC Jennifer Aniston was overcome with emotion introducing the tribute to the stars lost this year As she introduced the emotional Oscars tribute, Jennifer said: "Tonight, as we celebrate together we also take a moment to mourn the many legends that we lost this past year. "Whether they were a musical Prince, leading the revolution on a concert stage, or a movie Princess, leading the rebellion in a galaxy far, far away; a force of nature in front of the camera, or a force driving it. Each and every one was a cherished member of our Hollywood family." The 48-year-old struggled to hold back tears as she continued: "As was beloved actor and friend who left us just yesterday, Bill Paxton. All were loved and all will be missed." ABC Jennifer held back tears as she spoke about the tragic loss of Bill just a day before the Oscars ABC Jennifer introduced the In Memoriam segment that paid tribute to Hollywood stars that died this year Oscars 2017: Inside the Academy Award Show Mon, February 27, 2017
